import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import getData from "../../utils/getData" import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" export const QuestionPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const id = useParams().id console.log(id) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getQuestionData(id)) }, []) const [answers, setAnswers] = useState([ { author: "author", date: new Date(2020, 2, 16, 14, 20, 1), likes: 10, text: "Lorem fsgdfsg dfg dfg fdg fdg fdg fdg fdgfdgfdgfd" }, ]) const [value, setValue] = useState('') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setAnswers([...answers, { author: "author", date: new Date(), likes: 0, text: value, } ]) setValue('') } return (
